item.title: Gamuda Berhad (5398) Q1 FY2026 Review: A Construction Giant in Expansion Mode
item.description:
Gamuda Berhad (5398) Q1 FY2026 Review: A Construction Giant in Expansion Mode

Date: December 10, 2025
Stock Code: 5398 (Bursa Malaysia)
Sector: Construction & Engineering / Property

1. Introduction: The Blueprint of a Nation Builder

If you have driven through the SMART Tunnel during a storm, taken the MRT to work in Kuala Lumpur, or admired the master-planned townships of Kota Kemuning or Valencia, you have interacted with the work of Gamuda Berhad. As one of Malaysiaâ€™s largest infrastructure and property companies, Gamuda is often seen as a bellwether for the nation’s construction sector.
